statements: SELECT * FROM User_Data;
SELECT id, username, email FROM User_Data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, email FROM User_Data WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username, email FROM User_Data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM User_Data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT id, username, email FROM User_Data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM User_Data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM User_Data WHERE username = 'John' AND email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT username, encrypted_data FROM User_Data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM User_Data;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM blockchain WHERE block_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM user_data u JOIN blockchain b ON u.user_id = b.block_id;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT block_data FROM blockchain WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM user_data JOIN blockchain ON user_id = block_id;
SELECT user_id, block_id FROM user_data CROSS JOIN blockchain;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE blockchain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, encryption_key FROM user_data JOIN user_keys ON user_data.user_id = user_keys.user_id;
SELECT * FROM block_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity FROM block_logs WHERE blockchain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM user_keys WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, encryption_key FROM user_keys WHERE encryption_key = '\x2A4D6373';
SELECT b.log_id, b.timestamp, u.user_id FROM block_logs b JOIN user_data u ON b.blockchain_id = u.blockchain_id ORDER BY b.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_keys ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM blockchain WHERE block_id > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, encrypted_data FROM user_data WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT user_id, encryption_key, decryption_key FROM user_keys WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM blockchain ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blockchain WHERE previous_block_hash IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE data_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT users.username, logs.action FROM users JOIN logs ON users.user_id = logs.user_id WHERE logs.action = 'login';
